_header: Sweet Saint Anne we thee beseech
Subjects: Anne, saint; saints, prayers to; carols, of saints
_description: John Audelay, an invocation to St. Anne — nine 5-line stanzas (ababc) with ‘Herefore we say’ refrain and burden: ‘The moder of mary þat merceful may / Pray for vs both nyght & day’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Swete saynt tanne we te be secheþou pray fore vs to oure
                    laday…
BodDou302.Last Lines: …Sine fyne fore his merceHere fore I say
